attributes.action: Theresa May to Resign or a General Election to be called
attributes.background: In the event that Parliament has not agreed on a course of action to bring the UK out of the EU and honour the result of the referendum by the 30th June 2019 then Theresa May is to submit her resignation. Failing that a General Election should be called at the earliest opportunity.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job.

There are already petitions about holding a general election. You might like to sign one of these. You are more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/240407

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233622
